website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive protein powder with 5 types of collagen for full health benefits.
pros: Potent blend of collagen types improve health issues from sports injury to arthritic joint pain to IBS
Promotes nail and hair growth, and suppler skin
cons: For most consumers powder is tasteless and dissolves easily, but for a minority this isn't the case

customer_reviews.title: It grew my hair and made my skin smooth and supple
customer_reviews.text: I am a 66 year old woman very active and fit. No matter how long I spent at the gym my muscles were not responding as they had in the past and my skin tone was showing it’s age. Since using this, finished one container, my muscles are full and strong, my skin is smooth and there are little baby hairs growing along my hairline. I am blown away. I will never stop using this. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Mixes easily and great for your health!
customer_reviews.text: This collagen peptide powder is great. It dissolves easily into any beverage. I normally mix it in with my coffee and I don’t even notice a change in taste. As far as the health benefits, I can already see an improvement in the strength of my nails, which are no longer brittle. As far as gut health goes, taking collagen daily is a fantastic way to aid in the reversing of damage caused by poor diet, IBS or other auto-immune conditions, along with proper diet. All in all, I will continue to use this product for its quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brooding

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless! 💞
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the product for a couple of months and just got my second bottle. I have noticed a significant difference in my joint discomfort. I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to protect or improve their mobility and joint function.
customer_reviews.author: DWS

customer_reviews.title: It tastes great as it has no taste so I can mix ...
customer_reviews.text: It tastes great as it has no taste so I can mix it with anything without jacking up my perfect fatty coffee! I can also if needed to mix it with anything I like without altering the taste!!!! Yeah!!! Also, I had recently developed some shoulder discomfort and very quickly since taking this product that has subsided! I don't like having shoulder or really any joint issue so having my joint feel great is a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: Will W

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: This was my third purchase. I love how this dissolves completely and easily and that there is no discernable flavor. My hairs, nails, and skin all show a noticeable improvement on this product.
customer_reviews.author: PB~

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: New formula, new price. It tastes awful like chicken broth. It used to taste great, why change to worse? Huge container and half full. It used to be the same container that was completely full. I won't purchase this no more.
customer_reviews.author: Martha C.

customer_reviews.title: Improved skins elasticity
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’ 8” and 140 pounds I eat very clean and exercise frequently. I have always struggled with cellulite on my thighs despite my athletic physique. I have tried many types of cellulite treatment (I.e. lotions, message, laser lipo) and nothing really worked. I have been taking this collagen for about 2 weeks 2 times a day and I see a big improvement in my skins elasticity.
customer_reviews.author: AnnD

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both very pleased with the quality of this collagen. There is no smell or flavor, it mixes in great with any liquid. We have both noticed our skin and hair looking better and I've had pain with a knee for years, since I've been taking this I've had no pain!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie M

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to mix this product in cold and hot drinks, but it still wont mix good. I have even tried different types of drinks and it still doesn't mix. I will finish the bottle since I paid a lot for it, but I will not buy it again. I don't like drinking a drink that is gritty and tastes bad. So I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Powder
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff for hair, skin, and nails. Nails are super strong, hair is growing and hardly shedding, gray hair is not coming in like it used to, cheeks have more volume, face is no longer going south and I think my cellulite is reducing some all in a few weeks. All I can say is I wish I knew about this 30 years ago. I’d look 30 today. Mixes easily in coffee, tea, and protein drinks or smoothies. Tasteless and filling, keeping me satisfied for hours. I’m a collagen protein user for life!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug 2020

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Collagen Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this powder once a day for over a month and I have to say that my hair is definitly stronger. I believe that my nails are growing faster and do not appear to be as brittle. I also have less noticable joint pain in my knees. I will continue to use this product. It has been remarkable really.
customer_reviews.author: Nmheatwave

customer_reviews.title: Is not unflavored
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the taste. Says its unflavored. I diffentilly taste like bad chicken broth to me. The first time I put it in water , it was terrible. I read someone put it in they're coffee and couldn't taste anything, maybe they put cream and sugar, I drink mine black, totally ruined my coffee. I have not tried it again as I can't get past the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin, curbs appetite!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my first bottle and I'm super impressed with the quality of this collagen powder. I've tried several others in the past and for me, this particular one makes a noticeable difference in my skin condition (I don't wear makeup and have been getting compliments about my glowing skin) - plus I've noticed a curb in my appetite (I put one scoop into my morning coffee and am able to go without eating until dinner, with other collagen powders I would skip breakfast and only make it until lunchtime). Can't beat the price either - I bought 4 because my husband and I both use it daily, and I saved 20% off of the already great price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas' Mom

customer_reviews.title: Helping my digestive issues in only 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few other collagens for leaky gut and joint pain. This has the best (non) flavor and it mixes with anything including cold water. Definitely helping my digestive issues after 3 weeks of use, and my skin is softer and brighter which was a nice bonus. I’ll do two full months before I comment on joint pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Burgess

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have come to the place now where i can comment on this product. I love this product. I tastes great in mu smoothies and teas also in sauces when i cook. This products is so great that my skin, hair and nails look and feel great. It caused me to look younger. When I exercise i do have lots of energy and can go on for more that 45 mins. My gut feels healthier and oh I forgot, it keeps me full for the morning after taking it in my smoothies. Thank for a wonderful product and I did recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have to add that this product dissolves easily and doesn't have any bad taste
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product religiously twice a day, one scoop mid-morning and one before going to bed, for two weeks but haven't noticed any results on my skin or hair yet. I'm not sure if you have a healthy diet and eat enough protein daily, you won't see any additional benefit from taking this product. I have to add that this product dissolves easily and doesn't have any bad taste. I mix it with un-denatured whey protein in cold water. Personally I don't think this product works and is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Vahabi

customer_reviews.title: Helped joint pain and recovery.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, met initial expectations. I am a sem-pro basketball player, and purchased this product hoping the collagen would help my sore joints. The impact of basketball games and practices bothered my knees quite a bit, and most days my knees were sore. I took the product daily for a month. Within a week or so my joints began feeling relieved pressure. They swell up less frequently. The biggest change I've noticed is less lingering soreness. Since taking this product I have seen my day-after-exercise pain decrease noticeable. I will continue to take this product.
customer_reviews.author: Claudel

customer_reviews.title: Using it for joint pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have been using multi-collagen protein for months for pain I was feeling in my wrist no longer feeling the pain. Other people I Know Said they use it and it works great for them for pain. Decided to buy a bottle of it for my mother who is 76 for her hip pain and she says it has helped her tremendously. Before using it she would have trouble walking long-distance and she says it has greatly reduced her hip pain.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: The taste is terrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried with coffee the first time and didn’t notice, since then I’ve tried with water, milk and juice and all times I thought I was going to vomit from the flavor. I tried to mix in a blender to mix better and still had to choke it down. Will try with iced coffee again to see if I can finish to bottle without gagging.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!! Chemical smell- read  all the 1 star reviews. Scary!
customer_reviews.text: There is such a strong chemical smell and taste. It is supposed to be unflavored. So disappointed as reviews appeared to be good. Bought it for my son who is a competitive athlete, but the chemical smell worries me. We will throw in fear of poison. No joke. Terrible stuff. Anyone else notice the awful smell and Taste? It does not dissolve well either. I guess we’ll go back to Klean athlete brand of collagen that is 3rd party tested and nsf certified. Lesson learned. DO NOT BUY THIS GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness mom

customer_reviews.title: Best out of three - very happy
customer_reviews.text: After using three different brands of multi-collagen supplements I believe this is the best. By best, I mean easily dissolved, lack of taste, and I can actually see improvement in my nails and hair. I have been using collagen for over a years now and I give each brand 3-4 months before I decide if I like it. Improvement takes more than one bottle to be visible in hair regrowth. When I saw price on amazon I thought it was too low to be of good quality, but I tried it. It is just as good and better than the more expensive brands I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Bessyrose

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a difference a year makes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for the last 4 months and I LOVE it! Not only do I look 10yrs younger, but I also feel better than I have in a long time!! My body doesn’t hurt and my ankles aren’t sore like they used to be..I use this every morning in my bulletproof coffee and it’s completely tasteless, it helps me stay fuller longer. This makes my skin look fabulous and has all of the different collagens that I need!
customer_reviews.author: Mama6bears

customer_reviews.title: NOT TASTELESS!  tastes strange for tasteless
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this before and liked that I could add it to anything without it altering the flavor. It seemed to help my hair and my fingernails. This batch tastes like broth and salty. I am afraid to consume it. I like broth, but this wasn't supposed to be broth. I will not buy this brand again. I am very disappointed! There doesn't seem to be a refund option without the hassle of a return, so good money down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Day Reader

customer_reviews.title: There is a taste and it's not good.
customer_reviews.text: I was willing to buy because of the MCT, unfortunately there is a taste and it's not something you want in your mouth. I would like to suggest you try a different product because as good for you as this may be, it's not being ingested because of the offputting flavor. It ruins coffee and drink mixes. Neither I nor my daughter will finish this canister. BioSchwartz has a good one that I am ordering now (B07HMR9B9K). A product can do all the good in the world for you, but if it's gross, you can't get past that. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kilde: it's like "tilde" with a K.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. Soothes sore throat, full body soups
customer_reviews.text: Tried the powder in a hot drink and at first thought it tasted funny. Then added it to soup and was amazed by how rich and full flavored a simple can of chicken noodle soup could become. My kids thought it was homemade soup! Recently I’ve been having it my teawhile I’ve been trying to recover from a sore throat. The collagen soothes my throat like a miracle cure. The soothes effect lasts for hours. Thanks MAV!
customer_reviews.author: searching for grace

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried quite a few brands of collagen and have seen good results and never encountered much of a taste. Some have mixed better than others and they’ve varied by price, but besides that they were all pretty similar. The regular Mav nutrition collagen was one I liked, but this looked like it had more types so I thought I’d give it a try. Not sure if I got a bad batch or what but this tastes AWFUL! I’ve tried it with juice, coffee(how I’ve drank with other brands in the past), in smoothies and even milkshakes and it quite honestly ruins whatever you put it in. Will probably end up throwing it out, it’s too bad to choke down.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: all possible collagen types in one scoop
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to tell whether this collagen mix works after having tried it for only 2 weeks. I do like that it dissolves in my morning shake quickly and that it contains all possible collagen types in one scoop. This mix might be too pricey, though - I buy another highly praised brand of hydrolyzed collagen that contains two types through the Amazon subscription at a much cheaper price. Looking forward to great results after a couple of months on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Heleycis

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this product. I do get a "full" sensation after using it. As far as the "hair,skin & nails" part go.. my nails are smoother and have a sheen to them that that wasn't there before. I will continue using.
customer_reviews.author: judy l. smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the original but this one is even better
customer_reviews.text: Love the original but this one is even better! Have only use it for a week now and can already tell the difference In my skin and nail! Will Continue to purchase I the future!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A

customer_reviews.title: Half full and tastes terrible
customer_reviews.text: I JUST received this collagen protein powder in the mail. Don’t be fooled by the large container as it is actually only about half way full!! (See pics). Also, just tried a scoop in some tea and it tastes terrible. I’ve had other unflavored collagen powders before that are truly tasteless. This is not one of them. I’m going to try it tomorrow in my coffee and see if that disguises the taste better. Maybe it’s good it’s only half full! Ugh, So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this product. I drink it every morning I mix it with my coffee and it taste great! I have noticed that I have more energy, my hair seems to be looking healthier and maybe a little bit of TMI but I’ve become regular in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: LASHANDA VELEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a Muti Collagen Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few weeks and it has help reduce joint pain I was having in my hands, with the added bonus of healthier hair, skin and nails! It has multiple types of collagen that Doctors recommend and a much better price than what those Doctors are selling their mutil collagen for on their websites. It's tasteless, so I put it in my coffee in the morning and it disappears. Looking forward to further improvements.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nicsinger

customer_reviews.title: Contains multi  collagen types for bone health, flavorless, easy to mix.
customer_reviews.text: No flavor or after taste!! Easy to mix in juice or almond milk!! Includes the collagen types we are interested in for bone health!! On the negative side, the container says 58 servings (1 scoop per serving), but it only came out to 42! My husband and I are both taking it. We started using it on Thursday, February 6th and will take the last 2 servings tomorrow, Wednesday, February 26, lasting only 3 weeks. We had hoped to just order a new container once a month. We chose this product to help bone health as we are 50+ and my husband having arthritis. We thought it was a good value with 58 servings (42 actual) for a monthly supply.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with results.
customer_reviews.text: Been taking this for over a month. Put a scoop in my coffee. No taste at all. Mixes fast. Never had my nail grow so well since I was in my 20's. And my skin looks softer. All I can say is, probably will be using this for the rest of my days. Unless something better comes out.
customer_reviews.author: CyndaS

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. Below is her review. Been using this for a week once a day in my bulletproof coffee or tea. It has absolutely no taste so don’t let the ingredients scare you. It dissolves quickly and completely. No yucky chunks. I’ve noticed a difference already in my skin, especially my face. Also, I’ve had an issue in the past with my elbow joint whenever I’ve overworked it. The past week I was helping a friend move two days and I had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: figawu

customer_reviews.title: I like it better than othe other brand!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier. This is the 2nd type of Collagen I’ve tried and I’m impressed. It’s completely tasteless, dissolves (better in warm/hot liquids) thoroughly and guickly and has lived up to its claims. I’ve been taking this almost a month now and as a dancer, have noticed that I have a bit more energy, no joint pain, my skin is clearing up and I’ve actually lost a few pounds (not entirely due to this but I feel like it’s helped). I drink 1 scoop every morning in my coffee and I feel like this container is lasting forever!!!! Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: K.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched to this collagen from another brand. I really think this does miracles for your skin. It goes down easily in a protein shake or even in orange juice. It’s literally tasteless & no side effects except for some glowing skin. Will be repurchasing in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Max young

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This seems great so far! I've been taking 1 scoop daily for a little over a month. My nails and hair are growing ridiculously fast. I'm not sure if it's helped with my skin or digestion yet. Here's how I've tried it: - Black coffee - no taste - Black English Breakfast Tea - no taste - English Breakfast Tea with milk - tasted brothy - Cold Water - tiny hint of broth flavor - Smoothies - no taste It dissolved in all drinks, though did leave little "flecks" in the water (no big clumps)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Gives me a boost
customer_reviews.text: The product definitely has a fishy smell to it so I would mix it with some kind of flavored water if possible. It completely blends into the water when stirred, I guess you could mix it with milk or a protein shake too. I feel like I have extra energy during the day taking this, and I don't know anything about the skin or hair effects yet. I'll continue taking it though as it doesn't have any negative effects.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F.

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well and no aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: After doing research about relieving muscle soreness I found time and again collagen was recommended. I initially thought glucosamine was the was to go but not so and I'm happy to have found MAV Nutrition collagen. I've been supplementing for 14 days now and I'm definitely feeling a difference, the ease of mixing and lack of after taste as well as a great price makes this collagen protein a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Been Using For A Week Now...
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, I cannot say I’ve seen any obvious changes yet. It will probably take a couple of months. However, I don’t mind taking it at all. I blend it with a smoothie every day and it mixes great. When you first open it, it has a funny smell due to the protein sources but you cannot taste it at all. Will update in the future once I’ve used it for long enough to see a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I have been using one scoop every morning in my coffee. It’s tasteless and unnoticeable. BUT the results are far from unnoticeable: In 5 months, I’ve noticed new hair growth, more manageable hair/less frizz, stronger and longer nails and my knees no longer bother me when jogging. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My new go to Collagen supplement
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for a new Collagen supplement that provides a wide spectrum of Collagen types. I've gotten quite a few compliments on my skin complexion and my hair is thicker and stronger than ever before. After adding Collagen to supplementation to my diet, I was noticing a difference but having others notice too is very nice. The fact this collagen is derived from grass-fed sources is a big plus, the price is right and I feel as though the quality is there. I will be a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless & mixes well. Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this contains multiple forms of collagen and the price is good. The powder is fine in consistency and mixes well into most beverages. There is NO to a very slight taste depending on what type of beverage you mix it in. I have mixed it in juice, smoothies, protein shakes, and herbal teas - I prefer not to mix it in water. I haven't been using it very long, but my skin is feeling better already. Excited to see what the long term results will be with my hair, skin, nails, joints, and digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT "unflavored"
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this product and so far I've only used this for 4 days. I've already noticed an improvement in my digestive health. (Which is why I gave it 2 stars instead of 1) BUT I can't get past the taste. It's supposed to be unflavored. I can tolerate it in my coffee or hot chocolate. Their about the only things strong enough to hide the flavor. It will not mix well in cold juices. So because of the flavor, and a bit of a smell, I'm having a hard time incorporating it into daily living.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: High quality collagen
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Works just as it says it does! I had a great experience with your product! It is a high quality form of collagen. And I love getting the range of collagen from various sources. I just turned a new decade and get many compliments on my hair and skin which I use as an opportunity to tell them about Mav nutrition collagen! It has healed my digestive issues too which has helped keep my skin clear of acne. It also helps my hair and nails grow and reduces wrinkles. I am a loyal consumer of your product! Thank you for making and distributing such a high quality collagen supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Server40404

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working....
customer_reviews.text: Have not been using this product for very long. It's easy to incorporate into other things, no strong odor or taste. Fine consistency makes it easy to mix. I tolerate it well without issue. Very optimistic that it will provide helpful with my minor aches and pains along with skin, hair and nail benefits. Will post an update if that is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product primarily for the claims of being good for skin. I haven't really noticed improvements there yet, but it is helping my knees and my digestion. I have a touchy digestive system, and since taking this product, I haven't had any stomach issues. When I first started taking it, I took a scoop in the morning and at night. Now, I'm doing once per day only, at night. I wouldn't recommend mixing it with anything other than water. I mix it into 8 oz of water and drink it really fast because the taste is horrible. I think it would ruin coffee or juice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brophy

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves well, I added pictures of the collagen mixed with my nighttime multi vitamin. It's only 3 minutes in between pictures and one shake is all. Doesn't have much taste which is great. Haven't taken it quite long enough to see benefits but I'm hopeful. The rest of their products are quality. I like their other collagen also.
customer_reviews.author: ak7903

customer_reviews.title: Works great on hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for now until I see how it actually works. The low score is for a waste of packaging and being misleading. When I opened it, it looked like half the container was missing. I had to weigh it to make sure there hasn’t been a mistake. I will say I put it in my tea and can’t taste it. **Update** I can see that it’s really worked on my hair and nails, I’ve never been able to grow my nails out until now. But here we are! My hair is growing faster as well, which has its pros and cons (I have it colored, the frequency is getting expensive!).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Significant difference in my 80 yr. old mom's arthritis stiffness
customer_reviews.text: In the past couple of years, I've bought several different supplements for my mom that are supposed to be great for arthritis sufferers and after using them for a month or two, she wouldn't notice any difference. When I bought her this multi-collagen protein powder, she was amazed that after 2 weeks she felt less stiffness in her hands and after another couple weeks, her neck that's bothered her for several years, feels much better. This is something she'll be using for most likely for the rest of her life!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Petrovich

customer_reviews.title: Update* used to be a great product
customer_reviews.text: This last batch actually smells horrible and tastes horrible. Now I see where the bad reviews have been coming in about this product. Like you get one good batch or two and then they just start going downhill. This batch definitely upset my stomach something fierce and made me nauseous. I had to sit down on the bathroom floor at work. I won't be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney s.

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well and starts working fast
customer_reviews.text: Great multi-collagen powder. Seems to mix very well in cold ore hot liquids. I have only been using for a few weeks now. Already I can feel a major difference in my knees and hips. We’ll be ordering again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Allen Rose

customer_reviews.title: Better than Ancient Nutrition Collagen Protein
customer_reviews.text: I have used this collagen and Ancient Nutrition Collagen powders consistently for almost two years now. I have to say, this collagen protein is much better. I put a heaping scoop into my husband and I’s smoothie each morning and we can tell a huge difference. Our nails grow more quickly and my hair stays healthier between trims. I can’t say I feel a difference joint and connective tissue wise though which is the main reason why we add it to our smoothies. Save a couple dollars and use this product instead of Ancient Nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that plays well with flavored proteins
customer_reviews.text: I am 4 weeks into trying this protein and have had a positive experience. The product appears to made from quality ingredients and mixes well. I am using an unflavored version and mix it with another flavored protein. It does not adversely affect the flavor or consistency of the shake. At this point I would recommend the product. I gave it 4 stars since I am only 4 weeks in. Once I hit 8 weeks I will update to 5 if the product continues to perform well. I have not used a collagen based protein before and my major draw was the possibility of helping with joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: ShibaInu

customer_reviews.title: Container half full, weighed under advertised amount, strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I want this product to work, so I am giving it a shot and keeping it. But when I opened it I was shocked how low the volume inside the container was. It's weighing in at less than advertised. There is a strong smell to the product, but I toss it in with some flavored greens and don't notice it.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't expect you post this but I want you to know I stopped using your product because I realized it wasn't working for me. It did seem to have a slight effect on my skin but my joints weren't any less painful, my nails weren't growing or any less thin. I attribute to my body and your product not being compatible. I did give a fair shot and I have no complaints about your company.
customer_reviews.author: ria

customer_reviews.title: Best Collagen Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have tried two other collagens and the results from this one are enormously better all around. I started taking it for my knee pain. The doctor said I needed a replacement. That was six months ago and I am back to walking several miles with no pain and no surgery! And on top of that my skin and hair look better. It also helped my tummy. I like it so much I have recommended it to lots of people.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh, the taste
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that the taste is as strong as it is. I expected to be able to mix it in coffee or juice without tasting it. So that is the only reason for my two star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: While mine was not completely tasteless, it wasn't fishy or offputting enough to just drink it with water or mix it with anything. I do intense workouts and my joints take a beating. I've only tried one tub of this product but so far my joints are less achy/ not aching at all. My skin and nails are healthy and experience no other adverse side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product consistently for a few weeks now. I mix it every morning with my coffee. I mixes well and has no taste. I had heard the great reviews and was anxious to try this product for myself to see if I would see the same great results. I did. I could tell in just a week or so a huge difference in my hair and nails. I can't wait to see what the benefits of using this products for months will be. Thanks again for a great product. I will be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flaky company all about the money.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for about two years, I had auto ship monthly, I no longer use this brand do to Mav without notice decided to cancel auto ship and raise there prices. I understand having to stay competitive but customer loyalty obviously is not a concern. I found another company to purchase my collagen powder from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The great price was what prompted me to try it
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have purchased this brand of protein powder. I have used another brand which I consider high quality. Comparing the 2 brands, I must say that this is also high quality. The great price was what prompted me to try it. I like the fact that it is multi-collagen and dissolves well in liquids. I am looking forward to the many health benefits it will provide with longer use.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K,

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this brand hands down
customer_reviews.text: I use this, along with non dairy creamer, every morning in my coffee ~ this brand of multi collagen blends as easy as Cremora. I haven’t ever had a problem with it not dissolving, bad smell/taste or after taste (I have very sensitive olfactory senses); I believe is a great deal for the price. My photos show my coffee before & after adding a scoop of powdered collagen - can see it dissolved & blended in beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Siri Lynn Colomy

customer_reviews.title: Solid product!
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommend this product to me for my joint pain. Well after using it daily for just over a week, I have noticed less joint pain. So I would highly recommend this product to anyone not only for joint pain relief but overall wellness. I like that its unflavored so its easy to mix up and chug no weirdness.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Bocim

customer_reviews.title: Only okay at best
customer_reviews.text: Skipping all facts about results and so forth, even ignoring only so, so flavor, which is surprising, giving it's unflavored. There is one thing that I absolutely could not pass - it does not blend or dissolve well at all. I do use Promixx to mix my protein drinks, and it works great. However, this powder just likes to form small pieces, which makes it not pleasant to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Vidis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this collagen powder. I’m honestly hooked on it. My skin and nails are 100/100 better. As far as joint pain, didn’t feel any huge difference. But I will order from this company again definitely
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible. Hoping it works.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really hoping this product works. I did research to find a top rated product however I disagree with so many reviews that say this has no taste. This stuff is disgusting and definitely has a taste and really bad aftertaste. Trying to find something I can stomach it in. Definitely doesn’t work in my tea. I threw it in a protein shake and I could still taste it but not as bad as the tea. Some people put it in coffee but it ruined my coffee. Been using it about a week. No noticeable changes yet but hoping based on the high reviews that there will be something!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not dissolve completely.
customer_reviews.text: I have very mixed feelings about this product. It is tasteless .....BUT....it does not dissolve completely. There was grit in the bottom of every cup regardless of how much you stir. I was hoping for better results since it is made with a several different types of collagen. Also, when we received the product there was a sticker on top that said "to receive another one for free, text XXXXXX", We were willing to give it a little longer to see if we could feel or see any results. We followed all their requirements, but they never sent us the free one.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wiggs

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Def not flavorless can smell and taste the fish.did get clumped up when mixing almost looked like scrambled eggs. And not only did I buy this one but I got another one same weight and quantity on the container but it wasn't this was less than half full didn't see much pain relief but if your stomach is irregular this will make you go
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna

customer_reviews.title: Tastes gross
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this one in particular based on the huge amount of good reviews.. Mistake. The container is half empty upon arrival which leads me to believe it's mostly plastic weight from the oversized container and not actually a pound of product. Also, this is not unflavored. It tastes disgusting. And does not dissolve in cold liquids. I'm not sure about hot as it tastes so terrible I doubt I'll use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Collagen!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 6 different brands of collagen and this one is my favorite. Its really nice to have found one that I like. i look for a multi-collagen product with at least 5 types of collagen for the most well-rounded benefit and bang for my buck. The last one I tried was Alpine and it developed a very fishy smell after a short time, which I got tired of smelling first thing in the morning. I have no issues with this one at all. It mixes well, no taste. My hair is the healthiest its ever been since I was little, and my knees are doing much better.
customer_reviews.author: cmb

customer_reviews.title: One week...joint pain is gone
customer_reviews.text: This helped me get back on track and feeling good after a holiday season of poor eating, etc. I add it to chicken bouillon with dill weed and eat it as a soup each evening. Sometimes add real cooked chicken or meatballs and spinach and create a wedding type soup (without the pasta ...doing Keto right now).
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is flavorless!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the supplement. It is super easy to mix into basically anyting! I haven't noticed a major difference in my hair and nails, but I'm guessing that that will probably come with long-term use.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney F.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 10 days now. I have found that it mixes well & barley has a smell or taste. I mix it in my cup & hot green tea. I have noticed my hair has stopped falling out in clumps. I have noticed less pain in my fingers & hands. I believe over time this will be a game changer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lucey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: After a friend recommended this to me, I’ve been using this off and on for about a year for hair regrowth due to thyroid disease. There’s a notable difference with that as well as a decrease in my joint pain. It’s tasteless when mixed in with a cup of tea or your drink of choice. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Book_lover77

customer_reviews.title: Same stuff, less money!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking collagen in one form or another for a couple of years now. I tried this one because it was less money than the one I usually get and it says it has the same number of collagen types. After using it I can say I can’t tell any difference. I put it in my coffee every morning and I didn’’t notice anything different. Given the price difference I say go with this one, no reason not to.
customer_reviews.author: Duana J Bate

customer_reviews.title: Healthy protein and tasteless!
customer_reviews.text: Healthy collagen protein that is tasteless once mixed in your favorite beverage. I mix it with my hot tea or my coffee! I would recommend this product for anyone interested in adding collagen protein to their diet!
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Great in coffee
customer_reviews.text: We use it in our coffee almost every morning and it's helped my skin immensely and my husband and I have had reduced joint pain since we started using this regularly. Definitely worth it especially when you hit middle age.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Really works l
customer_reviews.text: excellent product ; I have tried this product for only 5 days and I already feel a little relief in the joints of my Shoulders Elbows and Knees. I also feel as if the skin of my face had begun to stretch. The taste of this supplement is very natural. It seems like I'm taking seaweed, chicken, fish, meat ... with a little bit of vanilla. It's rich I like it. and I would recommend it to the consumer 100%. also we have 60 days to try it and if it makes the effect that is beginning to produce. the money is returned. I mean nothing to lose !!!
customer_reviews.author: Peppe Quirozzi

customer_reviews.title: Strong Fishy taste
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was a bad bash but mine had a strong fishy taste. Will not buy again and stick to the one from ancient
customer_reviews.author: J. Kunkle

customer_reviews.title: Actual Results! Buying again!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this collagen for a few weeks now and I am surprised at how quickly I started to see results. I can already see a difference in my skin and my hair is feeling fuller and growing (finally!). I cannot wait you see the results when I continue to use this collagen. My only “complaint” would be is that it is not completely tasteless. It’s very slight and I don’t mind it so much mixed in my coffee but if mixing in water or a juice you can definitely taste it. However, I see actual results with this collagen compared to others I’ve tried. Therefore, definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: MacKelly

customer_reviews.title: Using for nails and wrinkle prevention
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this Collagen for a few weeks now. I wanted to help prevent wrinkles and help my nails grow stronger. I believe it has already helped my nails, but I need to continue use to really see any differences. I like the ease of use. I simply stir it into my coffee in the mornings. I think it is definitely worth a shot and I will continue using it and will try to remember to update my review once I finish my first bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collagen. I put it in my coffee every morning. Mixes well. It absolutely doesn’t change the taste of my coffee. I felt some results immediately. I have so much more energy. It has suppressed my appetite and I have lost about 8 lbs along with eating healthy and regular walks. I’m a hairdresser and work long hours. I noticed my body wasn’t hurting after a long day of working. I also am noticing my skin looking better. I’ve also been telling my clients about this product. I will continue use. T
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellnt Multi-Collagen
customer_reviews.text: I love the combination of different collagen in this product! It's almost flavorless, but has just enough flavor it doesn't taste well added to green shakes. It is great added to coffee or broth. If you don't like the flavour, add it to broth with sea salt. It's also a good nutrition boost for any soup! Most importantly, I can feel the difference using it. I've gone through one container. I've noticed a huge improvement in my joints, skin rejuvination, reduction of celulite, and digestion. Tip: A diet high in vit. C and other antioxidents greatly improve the benefits of collagen as they work synergetically.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased list last year and it changed my life completely. When I ran out I purchased another container of the same product. When I looked at the powder is appeared darker and the consistency was a little different but I didn’t think anything of it. It was only once I actually tasted the collagen that I knew something changed. It tastes terrible. I thought maybe they changed the formula but surely the effect it had on my body would still be the same. It did absolutely nothing. I assumed I received a bad batch. I ordered another container a few weeks later and it is still terrible. Need to find a different company.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Collagen!
customer_reviews.text: This product came recommended to me by my son in law and I Love it! My hair, skin and nails are looking fabulous! My hair and nails are even growing faster! I’m on my second container and I’m also noticing less joint pain as well, which is what I originally got this product for. I highly recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is gross! I have tried several brands on amazon and this is my least favorite. It stinks, it doesn't dissolve well, and it tastes bad. Every other brand I have tried is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but fishy smell and taste. I
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been growing fast and it feels thicker as my nails are too. I love this product, but it has a fishy smell and taste. I wasn’t going to order again because of that reason but it WORKS! I’m already used to the smell and taste. I put it in my energy drink in the morning and in my ginger tea at night. I’m glad I decided to use this and not give up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using any type of collagen supplement. I had been taking biotin for hair, skin and nails and felt like it wasn’t working after a few months. Started using this and so far it seems to be working. Have been mixing it with my daily smoothies. When first opening I was worried it would taste bad, but it literally has no taste and mixes well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Pain gone.
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever. Been on it for four months now. My skin has smooth out, my hair is thicker, and best of all, my bones don't hurt like they used to. Was considering knee and hip surgery but no longer. Was even able to do lunges again in training. Wish Docs would try this on their patients.
customer_reviews.author: Ciscokid

customer_reviews.title: no fishy taste
customer_reviews.text: I really like that there is no fishy taste and it really mixes well in my coffee. I bought it mostly for skin and nails and been using it for about 3 weeks already my nails are improving and I'm starting to see a difference in my skin hopefully as time goes on I will start seeing more improvement
customer_reviews.author: Minks

customer_reviews.title: Great powder!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a 4.8 overall, I would. I see a noticeable difference in my hair and nail length and thickness. Nails took about 2 weeks to see, hair thickness took about 2 months. The only thing is even tho it’s unflavored, the powder kind of tastes like egg shells. It’s very mild. However, since it’s unflavored it can go in anything and the taste goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hecner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! No Taste!
customer_reviews.text: This Multi Collagen Protein is great! I have been surprised that I have already noticed a difference when using the multi collagen versus just the beef collagen in the MAV Brand. So far, MAV has been my favorite brand. It dissolves so easily in my hot tea and I don't even realize it is there!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: easy to consume in smoothy
customer_reviews.text: Very neutral flavor so blends well with smoothies without adding tons of carbs. I've got some injuries so really focusing on diet, collagen and other supplements to strengthen my tissues. So far, the collagen is making a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jhon

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I’m still using their original product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’m still using their original product, I can’t wait to try their new one :-)
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This Collagen Powder goes in my latte every morning, I also include the other MAV Nutrition Collagen Powder, Vanilla bone broth protein, and coconut oil too, and this starts my day off right. It's like a meal and dessert all in one. Love it! It also helps the arthritis in my thumbs and I'm able to function much better.
customer_reviews.author: Sky P

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Tastes Great, Mixes Easily, No allergic reaction. So far not enough time to see major changes. It takes months to notice most supplements working, so I don't expect instant results. But so far this stuff has been really good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Review of MAV multi-collagen protein powder
customer_reviews.text: To help strengthen my joints - especially my knees and ankle. I'm still trying to figure out the best way to use it -- tried in coffee and tea and not crazy about the taste. Looking for other suggestions. I have a question? It says 5 types of food source on jar, but there are only 4: beef, chicken, fish and eggshell. What's the 5th?
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Impressed to find a collagen protein with such a comprehensive mix beyond I and III many others are limited to. Mixes well and has no flavor, which is convenient to add to a variety of hot or cold drinks. I noticed a quicker recovery from my workouts, particularly my joints. I also noticed a subtle improvement in my completion and healthier looking hair. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MAV Nutrition Multi Collagen Powder, Blend of Grass-Fed Beef, Chicken, Fish Peptides, Unflavored, 16oz
feature_bullets: COMPLETE COLLAGEN PROTEIN. MAV Nutrition Multi-Collagen is an all-in-one, premium collagen protein powder with a potent, high-quality blend of hydrolyzed bovine, chicken, fish, and egg collagen peptides, providing collagen Types I, II, III, IV, and X.

SUPPORTS BONES, JOINTS & MUSCLES. Multi Collagen peptides powder supports regeneration of cartilage, joints, and tendons and works to promote improved mobility. Just one serving a day will aid in the maintenance of strong muscles, bones and joints.*

HELPS MAINTAIN HEALTHY SKIN, HAIR & NAILS. Multi-Collagen Protein helps restore age-related loss of collagen and reduce signs of aging.* Our special formula provides hair skin and nails vitamins that also promote hair growth for women and men*.

SUPPORTS DIGESTIVE HEALTH*. This Whole 30-friendly formula is packed full of amino acids, proteins, and collagen, and essential nutrients from grass-fed beef, chicken bone broth, and wild fish, which work to support a healthy digestive system*.

HIGH PROTEIN | LOW CALORIE. One serving of Mav Nutrition Multi Collagen Protein powder provides 7g of protein, Collagen Types I, II, III, IV, and X, and only 30 calories. This keto collagen supplement is ideal for use in smoothies, juice, or tea.
